description: A cozy, circular room with stone walls and a high ceiling. The air is musty and filled with the scent of old books.

items.name: Old Wooden Desk
items.description: A worn wooden desk with a single chair behind it, bearing an intricately carved wooden box.

items.name: Bookshelf
items.description: A tall, narrow bookshelf with shelves filled to the brim with dusty old tomes.

items.name: Window
items.description: A single, narrow window with shutters that can be opened or closed.

items.name: Door
items.description: A sturdy wooden door with iron hinges and a large, rusted doorknob.
